description: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen and 0.21% spell damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen and 0.21% spell damage.
